parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>DISPLAYTITLE:getCompatiblePylonMagazines</title></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 1.72 </value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Loadouts </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get array of compatible pylon magazines</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> vehicle '''getCompatiblePylonMagazines''' pylon</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - aircraft object</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>
</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> pylon: [[Number]] - pylon id or [[String]] - pylon class name from <tt>TransportPylonsComponent &gt;&gt; pylons</tt> class (see Example 4). 0 or "" to return all compatible magazines from all pylons</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value>vehicleClass '''getCompatiblePylonMagazines''' pylon</value></part><part><name index="8"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>p21 </name>=<value> vehicleClass: [[String]] - aircraft config class</value></part><part><name index="9"/><value>
</value></part><part><name>p22 </name>=<value> pylon: [[Number]] - pylon id or [[String]] - pylon class name from </value></part><part><name index="10"/><value><tt>TransportPylonsComponent &gt;&gt; pylons</tt> class (see Example 4). 0 or "" to return all compatible magazines from all pylons</value></part><part><name index="11"/><value>

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value>[[Array]] </value></part><part><name index="12"/><value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] 0; // returns array of arrays containing all compatible magazines</code> </value></part><part><name index="13"/><value>EXAMPLE1
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>"Plane_Fighter_01_Base_F" [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] 3; // returns array of compatible magazines for the 3rd pylon</code> </value></part><part><name index="14"/><value>EXAMPLE2
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>jet1 [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] "pylon1"; // returns array of compatible magazines for the 1st pylon</code> </value></part><part><name index="15"/><value>EXAMPLE3
</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Get all pylon names for "Plane_Fighter_01_Base_F" <code>[[private]] _allPylons = "true" [[configClasses]] (
		[[configFile]] 
		>> 
		"CfgVehicles" 
		>> 
		"Plane_Fighter_01_Base_F" 
		>> 
		"Components" 
		>> 
		"TransportPylonsComponent" 
		>> 
		"pylons"
		) [[apply]] {[[configName]] _x};
		
[[hint]] [[str]] _allPylons;
/* return:	
[
	"pylon1",
	"pylon2",
	"pylon3",
	"pylon4",
	"pylonBayRight1",
	"pylonBayLeft1",
	"pylonBayCenter1",
	"pylonBayCenter2",
	"pylonBayCenter3",
	"pylonBayCenter4",
	"pylonBayCenter5",
	"pylonBayCenter6"
]*/</code> </value></part><part><name index="16"/><value>EXAMPLE3
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value>[[Arma 3 Vehicle Loadouts]],[[getPylonMagazines]],[[setAmmoOnPylon]],[[ammoOnPylon]],[[animatePylon]],[[animateBay]],[[setPylonsPriority]],[[setPylonLoadout]]

</value></part></template>
